channel.title: Help making command type thing. 317 PI
channel.description:
I wanna make, so where you right click a player and it says Walk here ------>Check stats<---- Folllow Trade
I want the check stats, is there a possible way to do that? Thanks please help!

item.title: Help making command type thing. 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Yes it’s possible. Look and see how your server adds the “attack” option when you’re in the wild. You’ll need to do the same for the Check Stats.

Read full topic
item.source: Help making command type thing. 317 PI
